message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $11,000. I believe it will be highly valuable to you.
I appreciate the offer, Alice, but I'm looking to pay closer to $9,500.  This is a fair price for both of us, as it's still well above your minimum and leaves room for me to make a profit.
I understand your position, Bob.  However, I know the true value of this product.  Would you consider $10,500?
